name: Clean the sea, but not for free
name_original: Clean the sea, but not for free
description:
"CleanTheSeaButNotForFree" is a game made for SEA JAM November 2021. The game is 2D modern 8bit  style. 

Controls:
WSAD - Move
LMB - Throwing Hook
RMB - Pull Hook
E- Interaction


Other information: The game was created thanks to the friendly cooperation of RandomowyRandom and Verniak. It was made in the Unity game engine.

Programming: RandomowyRandom
Music/sound effects/SoundTracks: Verniak, RandomowyRandom, and InspectorJ
Game design: Random Random and Verniak
Pixel art: Randomowy Random
Arrangement/Description/Tests: Verniak

All SoundTracks are included in this SoundCloud album

Peace!
